name: Gray Skies
description:
Gray Skies started as an exploration in immersive gameplay for my digital history class at Carleton University. Now I'm using it to explore the indie gaming scene.

The game takes place in an alternate history where a false alarm leads to nuclear armageddon. The game is about using the external world to impact the game world. 

Gray Skies Features:

  • Immersive Gameplay!
  • Crudely written dialogue!
  • Exciting Easter eggs!
  • Equally exciting bugs!
  • A few poorly drawn pictures!

If people actually play this and want more, I'd be more than happy to find and fix bugs or expand the game with more options and more images. 

Thanks for playing!
